means: 改编（乐曲）（以适应他种乐器或声部）

sentence.Network_en: Clerks transcribe everything that is said in court.
sentence.Network_cn: 书记员把在法庭上所有的话都记录在案。

sentence.Network_en: He gave up trying to write for the guitar and decided to transcribe the work for piano.
sentence.Network_cn: 他放弃了为吉他谱曲，决定把作品改编成钢琴曲。

sentence.Network_en: He wanted to transcribe completely the conversation of the lowlifes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想要把那些下层社会份子的对话完全抄录下来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'make a copy in writing'): from Latin transcribere, from trans- 'across' + scribere 'write'

entry.def: If you transcribe a speech or text, you write it out in a different form from the one in which it exists, for example by writing it out in full from notes or from a tape recording.

example.ex: She is transcribing, from his dictation, the diaries of Simon Forman...
example.tran: 她正根据他的口述记录西蒙·福曼的日记。

example.ex: Every telephone conversation will be recorded and transcribed.
example.tran: 所有电话交谈都将被录音并作全文转写。

entry.tran: (为适合其他乐器演奏而)改编(乐曲)
entry.def: If you transcribe a piece of music for an instrument which is not the one for which it was originally written, you rewrite it so that it can be played on that instrument.

example.ex: He gave up trying to write for the guitar and decided to transcribe the work for piano.
example.tran: 他放弃了为吉他谱曲，决定把作品改编成钢琴曲。

means.word_mean: 1. write out from speech, notes, etc.;

sentences.sentence: "Transcribe the oral history of this tribe"
"The Sanskrit text had to be transliterated"

means.word_mean: 3. rewrite or arrange a piece of music for an instrument or medium other than that originally intended

sentences.sentence: "The anthropologist transcribed the sentences of the native informant"

means.word_mean: 5. convert the genetic information in (a strand of DNA) into a strand of RNA, especially messenger RNA

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"变换,改变,转移"; 2. 表示"横过,越过"

trans横过,越过+continental大陆的→adj.横贯大陆的
trans横过,越过+luc光+ent……的→穿过去看到光
trans横过,越过+noraml正常的→adj.超出常规的
trans横过,越过+par看见+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
trans横过,越过+vers转+e→adj.横向的, 横断的
trans变换,改变,转移+action行动→交换行动→交易
